level.heading: Proceeding to determine parentage.
level.text: A court of the District authorized to determine parentage of a child may serve as a responding tribunal in a proceeding to determine parentage brought under this chapter or a law or procedure substantially similar to this chapter.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Interstate family support, available proceeding, determination of parentage, see § 46-303.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-301.01.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: "This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007."

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 701 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
